$interpreted: Experiment: Gaoooo~~
Elio: Sis Leah, don't run so fast. It's dangerous!
Leah: I can't wait any longer~ I have some stuff that I want that Angel to take back to my younger brother!
Leah: Hoho, a monster that dares to come near Rune Academy; I'll destroy you!
Experiment: Gao~?
Elio: Leah, calm down...
Aosta: I will be most troubled if you damage my little project here.
Leah: Monsters attack people. They are meant to be destroyed!
Aosta: It's not a monster. Besides, only thing I saw was you attacking it.
Elio: Indeed. This creature only attacks in  self-defense. It has no intention of actually causing serious harm to us.
Leah: Which side are you on!?
Aosta: An astute analysis...are you a student of Rune Academy?
Elio: I'm Elio, Life Magic. And you, good sir?
Aosta: I am Aosta. I scheduled a meeting with Ceres. There's supposed to be someone here to escort me into the Academy at this time.
Aosta: But I don't see a single soul.
Elio: Oh my... perhaps father has forgotten things again.
Aosta: Father?
Elio: I-I mean the headmaster...if that's the case, how about I be your escort!
Leah: Is it okay to let some random stranger in?
Elio: Don't you realize, if he really wanted to get in, he could have easily destroyed the barrier?
Aosta: Another correct analysis. If not for the sake of Ceres, one quick trip around this area and I've already found eight weak points in the barrier.
Elio: So, Mr. Clovis, allow me to lead the way.
Aosta: ......
Soldier: Get in!
Sione: Ugh!
Crushfang: Officer Sione? Heard you were in need of emergency treatment after being captured by Theodore. Feeling better now?
Sione: I've dealt with worse; the military doctor's cleared me for duty. Chieftain Crushfang, were you locked in here all this time?
Crushfang: Yes, living underground is a common thing for us Bears. Living in Kingdom of the Sun's dungeon though, is still quite rough.
Sione: ...Apologies, Chieftain Crushfang.
Crushfang: Don't blame yourself. Losing is a part of every war. When going to war, one must be prepared for the consequences.
Theodore: You should have such preparations the moment you decided to be my enemy.
Sione: Theodore!
Soldier: Ignorant fool! How dare you refer to your Majesty by his name! Get on your knees, now!
Sione: ...Sir, may I ask, what brought you here?
Theodore: So you avoided the issue of how to address me... impressive. You're indeed the daughter of a noble family.
Sione: ...After all, sir, you're still a member of the Carlos family.
Theodore: Very well, with your formal etiquette, my visit will not be wasted. I'm here to inform you; your family is coming to visit you later.
Sione: It couldn't be...you threatened the Aldric family with me!?
Theodore: I'll repeat what I said before. You should have made preparations the moment you decided to be my enemy.
Theodore: Thanks to you, the previously neutral Aldric family now have no choice but to openly acknowledge my right to the throne.
Sione: ...Despicable, utterly despicable, Theodore!
Soldier: How dare a prisoner like you speak with such disrespect!
Theodore: Naive, too naive! Compared to the price of losing, what's wrong with being despicable?
Theodore: You fools crowned Angelia and treated the civil war like child's play. Which successful leader doesn't understand the necessity of being despicable?
Sione: No, I have faith in the princess! She will not become someone like you!
Theodore: Is that so? Then how about you ask the leader of Bears who is standing right next to you?
Crushfang: ......
Sione: Chieftain Crushfang...?
Theodore: ...Hmph.
Sione: Chieftain Crushfang, I don't understand...
Crushfang: ...Before Razorclaw died, I thought I'd never change as well. Casualties were very severe in this battle. I ddin't know how princess would react.
Sione: No, the princess is a kind and gentle person. She wouldn't...
Crushfang: What if she discovered that her kindness only brings pain and suffering to those around her?

Crushfang: You know her well; answer this yourself. If the princess is truly a kind soul, which would she sacrifice for the greater good: 
Those around her, or herself?
Charle: ...These are the applications for the withdrawal of studies...documents for the return of teaching aids...these are signed...
Charle: Wait! The research transfer process...
Charle: Did I approve it the day before yesterday, or did I approved it at all? Oh dear lord...
Aosta: We've been here a while yet he hasn't noticed us at all. What's with all the work?
Elio: A while ago, King Theodore offered very lucrative enlistment benefits to those with arcane abilities.
Elio: This led to many teachers and students leaving the Academy for fame and money in the army.
Aosta: How ironic, the Academy's advocacy of freedom is now the main reason why it couldn't keep those who left for more riches.
Aosta: But, since I don't have time to waste here...
Aosta: Charle Ceres!
Charle: Aosta? Oh right, you did tell me that you're coming today...
Aosta: Just like I said in the letter, I'm going "there". Due to your relationship with Professor Dietrich, I'm here to give you a heads up.
Charle: That can wait. Last time in Atlas, what was the deal with you and that stranger with the black aura...
Aosta: ...This is not why I came here, so I refuse to answer.
Charle: YOU!
Aosta: The anniversary of Professor Dietrich's death is right around the corner. I would advise you not to anger me right now.
Charle: ......
Elio: Headmaster, besides your appointment with Mr. Clovis, you also forgot about your promise to meet with Miss Angel in Whistlewood Valley...
Charle: ... Angel?
Charle: Oh no, I forgot that as well. Did you meet her? In Whistlewood Valley?
Charle: I have other things to tend to. I'll notify the students regarding your entrance to the lab. You can go in there just fine.
Charle: However, before you leave the Academy, you will have to explain yourself regarding you and that stranger!
Aosta: If I'm in the mood. I'll take my leave now.
Charle: Elio, take me to where Miss Angel is waiting.
Elio: Yes, father.

If the princess is truly a kind soul, which would she sacrifice for the greater good: \nThose around her, or herself?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_012_002_dialog_english##_19_000","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...These are the applications for the withdrawal of studies...documents for the return of teaching aids...these are signed...","sfxName":"h0025_story_003","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_012_002_dialog_english##_19_001","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Wait! The research transfer process...","sfxName":"h0025_battle_hit_01_3_short_strong","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_012_002_dialog_english##_19_002","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Did I approve it the day before yesterday, or did I approved it at all? Oh dear lord...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_012_002_dialog_english##_20_000","SpeakerName":"Aosta","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0005","IconName":"h0005s4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"We've been here a while yet he hasn't noticed us at all. What's with all the work?  ","sfxName":"h0005_story_009","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_012_002_dialog_english##_20_001","SpeakerName":"Elio","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0133","IconName":"h0133s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"A while ago, King Theodore offered very lucrative enlistment benefits to those with arcane abilities.","sfxName":"h0133_story_008","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_012_002_dialog_english##_20_002","SpeakerName":"Elio","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0133","IconName":"h0133s4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"This led to many teachers and students leaving the Academy for fame and money in the army.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_012_002_dialog_english##_20_003","SpeakerName":"Aosta","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0005","IconName":"h0005s4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"How ironic, the Academy's advocacy of freedom is now the main reason why it couldn't keep those who left for more riches.","sfxName":"h0005_story_002","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_012_002_dialog_english##_20_004","SpeakerName":"Aosta","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0005","IconName":"h0005s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"But, since I don't have time to waste here... ","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_012_002_dialog_english##_20_005","SpeakerName":"Aosta","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0005","IconName":"h0005s4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Charle Ceres!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_012_002_dialog_english##_21_000","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Aosta? Oh right, you did tell me that you're coming today...","sfxName":"h0025_story_020","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_012_002_dialog_english##_21_001","SpeakerName":"Aosta","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0005","IconName":"h0005s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Just like I said in the letter, I'm going \"there\". Due to your relationship with Professor Dietrich, I'm here to give you a heads up.","sfxName":"h0005_story_018","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_012_002_dialog_english##_21_002","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"That can wait. Last time in Atlas, what was the deal with you and that stranger with the black aura...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_012_002_dialog_english##_21_003","SpeakerName":"Aosta","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0005","IconName":"h0005s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...This is not why I came here, so I refuse to answer.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_012_002_dialog_english##_21_004","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"YOU!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_012_002_dialog_english##_21_005","SpeakerName":"Aosta","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0005","IconName":"h0005s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"The anniversary of Professor Dietrich's death is right around the corner. I would advise you not to anger me right now.","sfxName":"h0005_story_002","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_012_002_dialog_english##_21_006","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_012_002_dialog_english##_22_000","SpeakerName":"Elio","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0133","IconName":"h0133s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Headmaster, besides your appointment with Mr. Clovis, you also forgot about your promise to meet with Miss Angel in Whistlewood Valley...","sfxName":"h0133_story_002","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_012_002_dialog_english##_22_001","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"... Angel?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_012_002_dialog_english##_22_002","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Oh no, I forgot that as well. Did you meet her? In Whistlewood Valley?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_012_002_dialog_english##_23_000","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I have other things to tend to. I'll notify the students regarding your entrance to the lab. You can go in there just fine.","sfxName":"h0025_story_016","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_012_002_dialog_english##_23_001","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"However, before you leave the Academy, you will have to explain yourself regarding you and that stranger!","sfxName":"h0025_story_019","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_012_002_dialog_english##_23_002","SpeakerName":"Aosta","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0005","IconName":"h0005s4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"If I'm in the mood. I'll take my leave now. ","sfxName":"h0005_story_001","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_012_002_dialog_english##_24_000","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Elio, take me to where Miss Angel is waiting.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_012_002_dialog_english##_24_001","SpeakerName":"Elio","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0133","IconName":"h0133s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Yes, father.","sfxName":"h0133_story_019","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_012_002_dialog_english##","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_012_002_dialog_english##","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_012_002_dialog_english##","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_012_002_dialog_english##","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0}]}
